Server.Placement matches: Added a period of 10 placement matches before players receive their first rank.

Server.Added anonymous challenges: Updated @1v1 to be anonymous and make them used more often. No more dodging Nekrosu :)

Server.Added cancel button: If both players agree to cancel a match, they can use the cancel button to close a room with no ELO adjustment

ELO & Ranks.Added .rank command for users: Players can use the .rank command to see their elo and rank stats on a player card

ELO & Ranks.Adjusted streak bonus: Maximum streak bonus reduced to 5 ELO

Quality of Life.Updated #rules: Messages in #rules were updated making them easier for players to understand

Admin.Added .show_user command: The .show_user command allows admins to quickly view a players full information

Admin.Added .add_elo & .remove_elo commands: The add and remove elo commands allow admins to more easily undo invalid games

Admin.Added .judge command: The .judge command allows admins to automatically judge a games outcome
